title: Login Error? "The Server is currently busy. Please try again later."
body: So, I'm trying to login, but it keeps saying "the Server is currently busy. Please try again later." and I did try again later, and it still didn't work. Please help Riot!

replies.body: This is dumb.  I get the errors as well, I could try spamming my login, or opening IE or whatever other random nonsense seems to work.  But really Riot, if I can't log into your game -- guess what? I'm not going to play it.

> So, I'm trying to login, but it keeps saying "the Server is currently busy. Please try again later." and I did try again later, and it still didn't work. Please help Riot!

WOOHOO! hey guys just spam your login, i got in like the 6th try!
